statements: UPDATE FundraisingEvents SET ticket_sales = 100, revenue = 5000.50 WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE FundraisingEvents SET attendance_count = 50, ticket_sales = 200, revenue = 3000.75 WHERE event_id = 2;
UPDATE FundraisingEvents SET attendance_count = 150, ticket_sales = 5000 WHERE event_id = 101;
UPDATE FundraisingEvents SET ticket_sales = 7500, revenue = 1234.56, attendance_count = 200 WHERE event_name = 'Gala Night';
UPDATE event_attendance SET attendance_status='Confirmed' WHERE event_id=100;
UPDATE ticket_sales SET ticket_quantity=ticket_quantity-1, ticket_price=25.50 WHERE ticket_id=500;
UPDATE event_attendance SET attendance_status = 'Present' WHERE event_id = 123 AND attendee_id = 456;
UPDATE ticket_sales SET ticket_quantity = ticket_quantity - 1, ticket_price = ticket_price * 0.9 WHERE ticket_id = 789;
UPDATE EventAttendance SET attendance_status = 'Present' WHERE attendee_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE TicketSales SET ticket_price = 25.00, sold_quantity = 100 WHERE event_id = 123;
UPDATE EventAttendance SET attendance_status = 'Confirmed' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE TicketSales SET sold_quantity = 50, ticket_price = 25.00 WHERE event_id = 2;
UPDATE EventAttendance SET attendance_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE event_id = 1
UPDATE TicketSales SET tickets_sold = 100, ticket_price = 50.00 WHERE ticket_id = 3
UPDATE EventAttendance SET attendance_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE event_id = 100 AND attendee_id = 200;
UPDATE TicketSales SET tickets_sold = tickets_sold + 10, ticket_price = 25.50 WHERE event_id = 101 AND ticket_id = 500;
UPDATE Event_Attendance SET check_in_time = '2022-11-30 10:00:00' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE Revenue SET revenue_amount = 2500.50, transaction_date = '2022-12-15' WHERE revenue_id = 5;
